name: Jalum Tome

flavor_text: Most books simply deliver knowledge. This one expects some in return.

name: Howling Golem
oracle_text: Whenever Howling Golem attacks or blocks, each player draws a card.
flavor_text: It wails of buried riches and the souls lost seeking them.

oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:

—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

name: Loreseeker's Stone
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Draw three cards. This ability costs {1} more to activate for each card in your hand.

oracle_text:

flavor_text: Draped with the pennon of a fallen outpost, the sword came to symbolize the peoples of Zendikar becoming one.

oracle_text:
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Juri, Master of the Revue.
When "Juri, Master of the Revue" dies, it deals damage to any target equal to its power.
flavor_text: "What a show! We're going to make a killing tonight."

flavor_text: "Send in your cavalry! Diaglu loves horsemeat."

flavor_text: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.

oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Destroy all artifacts.

• Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
